resources.string: This app is powered by genetic data.
Do you want this app to analyze genetic data from one of your files or a sample file?

This app uses Real-Time PersonalizationTM (RTP) technology to analyze your genes and the weather, together. You'll receive daily guidance that is genetically tailored to you. This guidance is your forecast for a healthier day! 

RTP is as easy as 1, 2, 3… 

1) RTP is powered by genetic data. 
	◦Select "My Files" to use your own data. 
	◦Select "Sample Files" to use fun sample data. 

2) On the next screen, a list of files will appear. Select one file from the list. 
	◦This app's Real-Time PersonalizationTM will be powered by the genetic data in the file you select. 

3) Press Continue. 
	◦Weather My Way will analyze your genes and the weather each day.

Your Sequencing.com account doesn\'t appear to have any genetic data. Please go to the Upload Center at Sequencing.com to upload your genetic data. You\'ll then be able to connect this app with your genetic data. Until then, please use one of the following sample files
